name: Ace User Management
author: AceWebx Team

sections.description:
This plugin helps us create a registration form with unlimited custom fields. It also provides Captcha to prevent spamming in the registration form.

⚡️ FEATURES

  • Create fields in the registration form according to your needs for users.
  • Set custom fields based on your requirements.
  • Update custom fields and delete them in your template.
  • Set reCAPTCHA on your login page and registration page.
  • Customize the stylesheet only for plugin pages.
  • This panel comes with 6 different languages (Hebrew, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese, Portuguese, German).
sections.installation:
1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress.
  2. Search for “Ace User Management.”
  3. Click “Install.”
  4. Click “Activate.”
  5. Once you activate the plugin, it creates the required pages for Registration, Login, and Forgot Password, etc.
  6. Click on User Registration to access the setting options.
sections.faq:
Can we have option to disable/enable reCAPTCHA?

Yes, there is an option to disable/enable reCAPTCHA according to your requirements.

Can i add multiple custom fields?

Yes, in this plugin, you can add your own multiple fields.

Where can I report a bug?

You can report bugs, suggest ideas, and participate in development by emailing us at developer@acewebx.com.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.3

  • Features:
    Added support for 6 different languages: Hebrew, Spanish,
    Japanese, Chinese, Portuguese, and German.

  • Bug Fixes:
    Resolved the CSS issue with the Edit field button.
    Fixed undefined variables for the admin.
